testsuite.name: grailsblog.BlogPostControllerSpec

testcase.name: Test the index action returns the correct model
Test the create action returns the correct model
Test the save action correctly persists an instance
Test that the show action returns the correct model
Test that the edit action returns the correct model
Test the update action performs an update on a valid domain instance
Test that the delete action deletes an instance if it exists
Test that the saveComment action adds a comment to the blog post

failure.message: org.grails.web.servlet.mvc.exceptions.ControllerExecutionException: Error processing GroovyPageView: [views/blogPost/_commentsTemplate.gsp:3] Error executing tag <g:formatDate>: Cannot invoke method getTimeZone() on null object
